36.eng-name: The Book of the Kind Treatment of Women

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that the Prophet said to her:"Jibril sends greetings of Salam to you." She said: "And upon him be peace and the mercy of Allah and His blessings; you see what we do not

chapter.ara-name: باب حُبِّ الرَّجُلِ بَعْضَ نِسَائِهِ أَكْثَرَ مِنْ بَعْضٍ
chapter.eng-name: When A Man Loves One Of His Wives More Than Another
